description: This file declares the interface for a device descriptor handler module. It includes function prototypes for initializing, destroying, and updating device descriptors, as well as handling callbacks for when device descriptors are ready or have been updated.

methods.name: deviceServiceDeviceDescriptorsInit
methods.description: Initializes the device descriptor handler and registers callbacks for when device descriptors are ready and updated.

methods.name: deviceServiceDeviceDescriptorsDestroy
methods.description: Cleans up resources used by the device descriptor handler during shutdown.

methods.name: deviceDescriptorsUpdateWhitelist
methods.description: Processes and downloads a whitelist URL, invoking the ready callback upon success.

methods.name: deviceDescriptorsUpdateBlacklist
methods.description: Processes and downloads a blacklist URL.
